title: Auto-join pond creators to their newly created ponds

requirements.text: Update the backend pond creation flow so that the pond creator is automatically added as a member of the pond at creation time (i.e., the creator immediately “joins” the pond they just created).

quotes: make it so pond creators automatically join their ponds

acceptanceCriteria: When createPond is called successfully, the newly created Pond record includes the creator in Pond.members.
The newly created Pond record has memberCount that reflects the creator’s membership (i.e., at least 1 on creation).
The creator’s profile joinedPonds (phrase-hash based user profile storage) includes the newly created pond name immediately after creation.
If the creator is already present in the pond membership list due to any edge case, the backend does not add a duplicate membership entry and does not double-increment memberCount.
Existing createPond behavior (pond metadata, images, admin/moderator assignment, etc.) continues to work as before.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no additional backend services).
Do not edit frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Changing the pond join/leave UI behavior or adding new UI screens.
Adding new authentication providers beyond the existing Internet Identity/phrase-hash identity approach.
